name: [ט] EGO 9:2
description: You have bonded with EGO 9:2, for better, or for worse.

name: [ט] EGO 9:2 - Invoke Bond
description: Activate your bond with EGO 9:2, strengthening you and wreathing you in flame.

name: [ט] EGO 9:2 stage 1 activation
description: Разжигает внутреннее пламя, на короткое время даруя силу и стойкость к огню.

name: [ט] EGO 9:2 Aura
description: A spiral of flame wreaths you, enhancing your capabilities beyond that of mortality. May your foes be burned as they strike at you, and warmth be your ally, not your foe.

name: [ט] Imperfect EGO 9:2 - Summon sword
description: Call forth the imperfect blade of a prophet.
message: *A clot of flame appears in your hand, forms a sword and solidifies into a solid form*

name: 9:2 sword summon true
message: A clot of flame appears in your hand, forms a sword and solidifies into a solid form.

name: [ט] EGO 9:2 - Summon armor
description: Call forth the armor of a prophet.
message: The flame enveloped you, but it does not burn, after which the armor of the Prophet materialized on you.

name: 9:2 retaliation
description: hit your enemy back by fire

name: [ט] EGO 9:2 Stage 4 Explosion
description: Erupt into flames like a glorious phoenix.

name: Under the Gaze
apply_message: Someone looked at you with malevolent intentions.

name: Cooldown of Gaze
desc: Avert your eyes, and wait a minute.

effect.spawn_message: candle spawned from enemy from your gaze
effect.spawn_message_plural: candles spawned from enemy from your gaze

name: Living flame secondary explosion
description: detonate living flame on targets covered by explosion

name: <color_red>Live Flame</color>
desc: Living flame dances on you harmlesly

name: [ט] EGO 9:2 - Summon sword and grimoire
description: Call forth the blade and grimoire of a True Prophet.
message: A clot of flame appears in your hand, forms a sword and solidifies into a solid form.

name: [ט] EGO 9:2 - Summon armor
description: Call forth the armor of a True Prophet.

name: 9:2 retaliation
description: hit your enemy back by fire

name: [ט] EGO 9:2 Live Flame Toggle
description: Ignites an inner flame, granting strength and resilience to fire for a short time.

name: <color_red>Knowledge</color>
description: Stack "Knowledge" on target, if 3 stacks - player restore stamina

name: <color_red>IMMOLATE</color>
description: You deal huge ammount of fire damage
Summon desc. Summon 1 symbol and + 1 for every one candle.

name: [ט] EGO 9:2 - Binding flame
description: You bind your target with chains of flame.

name: [ט] EGO 9:2 - Flame Strike
description: desc. You cast line of flame

name: [ט] EGO 9:2 - Explode Gaze
description: desc. gaze on target explode, delete stack of gaze from target. deal huge damage

name: [ט] EGO 9:2 - Explode Gaze
description: Gaze on target explodes, delete a stack of gaze from target and deal huge damage.
Summon desc. Summon 1 medium symbol and + 1 if there is 4 candles.
You teleport at point and then air explodes around you.

name: [ט] EGO 9:2 - Reignite
description: You consume all stacks of living flame from targets and heal.

name: [ט] EGO 9:2 - Fluidity of Flame
description: Restore pain at cost of high stamina, also increase evade.

name: <color_red>Fluidity of Flame</color>
desc: It's nigh impossible to hit you.

name: [ט] EGO 9:2 - Evaporize
description: A lot of damage in cone. Apply Living Flame stack on targets.

set_string_var: They shall all be shown the light.
These people walk in the darkness.
We will ignite a guiding light in these lost souls.
We shall cleanse the world of the corrupted.
A candle for every lost soul.
We shall alight the fuel that ends this apocalypse.
The people walking in darkness have seen a great light.
On those living in the land of deep darkness a light has dawned.
We must not linger in the darkness.
You are a worthy prophet to hold my power.
Together we shall bring the light, the fire.
Even in this dark age, the darkness receeds as humans grow few.
You are the true prophet, the one whom brings the light.
Leave not a wretch without the gift of our flames!
All shall be shown the way, through you.
And so we shall bring a light to the darkest of days.
And the world is left ablaze.
